about.description:
Consul is a tool for discovering and configuring services in your
infrastructure. It provides several key features, including:
Service Discovery, Health Checking, KV Store, Multi Datacenter.
Consul is designed to be friendly to both the DevOps community and
application developers, making it perfect for modern, elastic infrastructures.
about.summary: Service discovery and configuration made easy.

name: consul
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "consul" %}
{% set version = "0.8.2" %}
{% set build_number = 0 %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://releases.hashicorp.com/{{ name }}/{{ version }}/{{ name }}_{{ version }}_linux_amd64.zip  # [linux64]
  url: https://releases.hashicorp.com/{{ name }}/{{ version }}/{{ name }}_{{ version }}_linux_386.zip  # [linux32]
  url: https://releases.hashicorp.com/{{ name }}/{{ version }}/{{ name }}_{{ version }}_darwin_amd64.zip  # [osx]
  url: https://releases.hashicorp.com/{{ name }}/{{ version }}/{{ name }}_{{ version }}_windows_amd64.zip  # [win64]
  url: https://releases.hashicorp.com/{{ name }}/{{ version }}/{{ name }}_{{ version }}_windows_386.zip  # [win32]
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: 63de23c7de3b9b48592353f8427ad40a9dd28da51a66c9f3759f5fdfd6aad136  # [osx]
  sha256: f60237e24e4f03d8f7fd8a4e31cb246c701c41beb7cb7d1735320a5aa0b331c8  # [linux32]
  sha256: 6409336d15baea0b9f60abfcf7c28f7db264ba83499aa8e7f608fb0e273514d9  # [linux64]
  sha256: 98d840c42e255e1d6011e601bcb1a86b0133e381ce836b4d97e92d9d3c882c8b  # [win32]
  sha256: e3def6d26c26937a5c33327ff2884322aa12bdd29235335d877864e05a12fb52  # [win64]

build:
  number: {{ build_number }}

test:
  commands:
    - consul -v

about:
  home: https://www.consul.io
  license: MPL 2.0
  summary: Service discovery and configuration made easy.
  description: |
    Consul is a tool for discovering and configuring services in your 
    infrastructure. It provides several key features, including: 
    Service Discovery, Health Checking, KV Store, Multi Datacenter.
    Consul is designed to be friendly to both the DevOps community and 
    application developers, making it perfect for modern, elastic infrastructures.

  doc_url: https://www.consul.io/docs/index.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre

Consul is designed to be friendly to both the DevOps community and
